DOC.brief_title: Comparing Dry Needling Manual Therapy Patients With Mechanical Low Back Pain

Eligibility assessment perform treat physical therapist include subject filling demographic / health history questionnaire , outcome measure , clinical examination . The treat physical therapist use 2 component examination eligibility criterion study . The treat therapist press subject 's joint back try elicit chief complaint . The treat physical therapist also press muscle subject 's back check trigger point . A trigger point would include recreation chief complaint , tenderness , hypersensitivity , refer pain . The treat physical therapist draw X patient 's back trigger point ( myofascial trigger point MTrP ) exist . This point use data collect physical therapist order collect pain pressure threshold trigger point . The data collect physical therapist subject complete Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) , gather measure pain patient , pain pressure threshold . Each subject allocate either manual therapy group dry needle group . Once subject assign group , receive either trigger point dry needle manual therapy mobilization treat therapist . Each subject remain assigned group long continue study 3 week . In addition treatment investigation , standardize home exercise program assign subject treat physical therapist . DOC.criteria: There 100 subject participate study present mechanical low back pain , range 1870 year old . Subjects excluded examine therapist provoke either active latent MTrPs subject 's low back muscle and/or elicit symptom manual passive movement spine joint low back . Subjects exclude demonstrate sign Chronic Regional Pain Syndrome ( CRPS ) , currently seek litigation , unable speak English , and/or diagnose condition cause prolong MTrPs fibromyalgia , hypothyroidism , iron deficiency .
